definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: circumcise (NH id.; Targum [[מוּל]] cut off (grass, etc.: only for III. [[מָלַל]], q. v.); cf. NH [[מָהַל]], Aram. [[מְהַל]], acc. to Thes Nö:ZMG xi. 1886, 741 Ba:ib. xii. 1887, 626 v. also [[מהל]]supr.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[מָל]] Jos 5:4 + 2 t.; 2 ms. [[מַלְתָּה]] Ex 12:44; 3 mpl. [[מָ֫לוּ]] Jos 5:5; Jos 5:7; 2 mpl. [[מַלְתֶּם]] De 10:16; Impf. [[וַיָּ֫מָל]] Ge 17:23 + 2 t.; Imv. [[מׂל]] Jos 5:2; Pt. pass. [[מוּל]] Je 9:24; pl. [[מֻלִים]] Jos 5:5; —circumcise, c. acc. [[בשׂר ערלה]] (flesh of foreskin) Ge 17:23 (P), acc.pers. Ge 21:4, Ex 12:44 (P), Jos 5:2, Jos 5:3 (J), v:Jos 5:4, v:Jos 5:5, v:Jos 5:7, v:Jos 5:7 (D); fig. [[ערלת לבב]] (foreskin of the heart) De 10:16; [[לבב]] De 30:6; pass, [[מוּל בערלה]] Je 9:24; [[מֻלִים]] Jos 5:5 (D).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נִמּוֹל]] (Ges:§ 72, R. 9) Ge 17:26; 3 mpl. [[נִמּׂ֫לוּ]] Ge 17:27; 2 mpl. [[וּׁנְמִלְתֶּם]] (consec.) Ge 17:11 (for [[וּנְמַלּֽתֶם]] √ [[מלל]] Ew:§ 234; e. Ges:§ 67, R.11; but Bö:1146B for [[וּנְמוֹלֽתֶם]]); Impf. [[יִמּוֹל]] Ge 17:12 + 3 t.; 3 mpl. [[וַיִּמּׂ֫לוּ]] Ge 34:24; Imv. [[הִמָּׂלוּ]] Je 4:4; Inf. [[הִמּוֹל]] Ge 17:10 + 5 t.; [[הִמּׂל]] Ge 34:15; sf. [[הִמּׂ֫לוֹ]] Ge 17:24, Ge 17:25; Pt. pl. [[נִמּׂלִים]] Ge 34:22; —be circumcised, of [[בשׂר ערלה]] Ge 17:14, Ge 17:24, Ge 17:25, Le 12:3; elsewhere of pers. Ge 17:10, Ge 17:10, Ge 17:12, Ge 17:13, Ge 17:13, Ge 17:26, Ge 17:27, Ge 34:15, Ge 34:17, Ge 34:22, Ge 34:24, Ex 12:48 (P), Jos 5:8 (J): reflex. ´[[הִמּׂלוּ לי]] Je 4:4 circumcise yourselves to Yahweh (and take away the foreskin of your heart).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 1s. [[כי אֲמִילִָם]] ´[[בשׁם י]] Ps 118:10, Ps 118:11, Ps 118:12 in the name of ´[[י]], yea I will make them to be circumcised (enemies, by force of arms ; but De cut to pieces (from [[מוּל]] = [[מָלַל]]), Che mow, Bae annihilate (?), LXX Aq h)muna/mhn, Symm die/qruya, Jer ultus sum eas).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִתְמׂלָָלוּ]] Ps 58:8 be cut off, of arrows, i.e. made blunt.
